name: STAROSTAT pre-alpha
description:
STAROSTAT pre-alpha

Prototype version!

We are waiting for a psychedelic, autobiographical, romantic thriller. The main character will be a collective image of a typical fan and member of POTATOM, he will have to go through the stage of growing up, during which, unfortunately, a number of events fall, which turned out to be a turning point for him. Occupation of a new position, new responsibilities, the situation in the world, new acquaintances, erotic and sexual experience... You have to feel this period in the life of a lyrical hero who will give you endless reflection, tons of sparkling humor and Volochkova's dog.

Will you be able to overcome all difficulties, overcome the routine, socialize, or will you give up and die in a ditch?
